advisory.name: RLBA-2022:1896
advisory.synopsis: rhel-system-roles bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for rhel-system-roles is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: [Network] RFE: Support ignoring default gateway retrieved by DHCP/IPv6-RA
metrics role can't be re-run if the Grafana admin password has been changed
linux-system-roles.selinux fails linit rules role-name and unnamed-task
sshd - should detect FIPS mode and handle tasks correctly in FIPS mode
NBDE client system role does not support servers with static IP addresses
[RFE] support WPA3 Simultaneous Authentication of Equals(SAE)
[RFE] support wifi Enhanced Open (OWE)
Logging - Performance improvement
Vendoring non-builtin modules for Ansible 2.11+
Replace `# {{ ansible_managed }}` with `{{ ansible_managed | comment }}`
[RFE] Add more bonding options to rhel-system-roles.network
[RFE]  logging - Add user and password
RHEL System Roles Automation Hub site should link to downstream/Red Hat links
Support ansible-core 2.11+
RFE: Add support for cached volumes (lvm-only)
RFE: Add support for RAID volumes (lvm-only)
Please include "cockpit" role
logging role missing quotes for immark module interval value
add regenerate-all to the dracut command
certificates: "group" option keeps certificates inaccessible to the group
Update network system role to reflect that network teaming is deprecated in RHEL 9
[RFE] - Firewall RHEL System Role should be able to set default zone
kdump: support reboot required and reboot ok
ssh/tests_all_options.yml: "assertion": "'StdinNull yes' in config.content | b64decode ", failure

Set DNS search setting only for enabled IP protocols
[RFE] ha_cluster - Support for creating resource constraints (Location, Ordering, etc.)
ensure zone exists and can be used in subsequent operations

kernel_settings role should use ansible_managed in its configuration file
incorrectly missing netaddr on a controller
ha_cluster - set permissions for haclient group
tlog - consistently use ansible_managed in configuration files managed by role
certificate - should consistently use ansible_managed in hook scripts
vpn - consistently use ansible_managed in configuration files managed by role
ensure target changes take effect immediately
metrics - consistently use ansible_managed in configuration files managed by role
network - consistently use ansible_managed in configuration files managed by role
postfix - consistently use ansible_managed in configuration files managed by role
